featured.text: Based on the passage, in order to break into computer codes, one needs (A) an elaborate and expensive multi-media computer.
Nowadays, on April Fools’ Day, people often 19 to create elaborate hoaxes to fool others.
It typically comes in a very wide variety, from fairly plain to quite elaborate silver- and jewel-ornamented designs.

definition.zh_def: 詳細說明或闡述某事物。
definition.en_def: To explain or describe something in detail.
definition.example: She asked him to elaborate on his plan for the project.
